entry.string: It is currently responsible for accomplishing these tasks:
entry.translation: It is coorrently respunseeble-a fur eccumpleeshing zeese-a tesks:

entry.string: Tracking where your incoming traffic originates
entry.translation: Treckeeng vhere-a yuoor incumeeng treffffeec ooreeginetes

entry.string: When logged in as administrator, you have the option of viewing the referers or configuring the module. Currently you can set the number of referers to be listed.
entry.translation: Vhee lugged in es edmeenistretur, yuoo hefe-a zee oopshun ooff feeooing zee refferers oor cunffeegooring zee mudoole-a. Coorrently yuoo cun set zee noomber ooff refferers tu be-a leested. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: View the referers. This allows you to see where your traffic originates.
entry.translation: Feeoo zee refferers. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Thees elloos yuoo tu see-a vhere-a yuoor treffffeec ooreeginetes. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: There are no included blocks with this module.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded blucks veet thees mudoole-a.

entry.string: There are no included hooks with this module.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded huuks veet thees mudoole-a.
